item.description:
April 16, 8pm: The Web of the Mind
April 23, 8pm: Karma, Reincarnation, and More.

Dr. Allan Hughes is presenter for this exciting series.

To register for the second class click here[/url]sign up link

For more information about these classes and other Science of Spirituality programs, see our local website
item.why: Taking a class at home, in front of your own computer, is definitely the way to go. Super relaxing.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: Live Web Event -- Second Meditation Class: The Web of the Mind
